The opportunities are endless at LEGOLAND® Califoria Resort! Join Our Team Benefits Social Responsibility Earn AWESOME Benefits Our Model Citizens enjoy: Pay rates start at $17.00/Hr. Health, dental, and vision insurance plans for full-time Model Citizens Family passes to LEGOLAND California Resort Merlin Magic Pass that give you access to LEGOLAND California Resort and Merlin Entertainments Attractions 30% off discount on retail and food Discounted meals at our employee cafes back of house area Discounts at a variety of local businesses including local eateries, hotels, and more Opportunity to grow with a global company The chance to create magical memories to last a lifetime Tuition Reimbursement up to $5000.00 for PT/FT employees! PAID working Holidays (New Years, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas) Make an AWESOME Difference Together we can make a difference and create a workplace where everyone feels valued, no matter their age, race, gender, disability, or sexual orientation. We can be a force for good by connecting with one another, our Guests, and our community. Merlin’s Magic Wand LEGOLAND® California Resort is part of Merlin Entertainments, the #1 entertainment business in Europe and #2 globally. There are hundreds of Merlin attractions worldwide including LEGOLAND® Discovery Centers, SEA LIFE Aquariums, Madame Tussauds™ Wax Museums, and so much more! (And yes – our employees get free tickets!) We are delighted to support Merlin’s Magic Wand – a charity that puts the magic back into the childhoods of seriously ill, disabled, and disadvantaged children across the world. They help thousands of children and their families have magical days out every year. For children who are too unwell for a day out, they find innovative ways to deliver magic to the children. To learn more, please visit www.merlinsmagicwand.org . Green Wave LEGOLAND® California Resort has made multiple upgrades to become an eco-friendly business and continues to be committed to providing the best family theme park in the United States while optimizing recycling, water conservation, and other earth-conscious management techniques. We invite Model Citizens (employees) from all departments to our “Green Wave Committee,” to provide ideas and direction for continuing efforts to create a clean, eco-friendly environment for kids, families, and Model Citizens to enjoy. Jobs with LEGOLAND California Partners LEGOLAND California Resort partners with a number of independent companies who staff roles based out of the Resort, including: Aramark – Food & Beverage Team Members to Culinary positions available - Apply now! Aramark Careers - Search Email HB Leisure - Games Operator: Interact with guests and entice them to play a game; explaining rules of play, handling payment and giving out prizes! Join Us | HBL (hbleisure.com) Email PomVom - Join our Team of Photographers and Sales Associates.  You don’t need photo or video experience to be successful! Email Kaman's Art Shoppe - Let’s Make Art Together! Kaman’s Art Shoppes is America’s largest art, photo and specialty merchandise concessionaire company for theme parks and zoo. Email Please inquire directly with these companies for job opportunities. Please note that these companies are independently owned and operated, and if successful in securing a role with any of them, you will not be working directly for LEGOLAND California Resort or Merlin Entertainments. Sign up to our Newsletter here! Sign up to receive our awesome email newsletters, including all the latest news and exclusive offers! Submit legoland.com Other LEGOLAND® Parks LEGOLAND Billund LEGOLAND Deutschland LEGOLAND Dubai LEGOLAND Florida LEGOLAND Japan LEGOLAND Korea LEGOLAND Malaysia LEGOLAND New York LEGOLAND Windsor LEGOLAND Water Park at Gardaland Start Our Company Jobs Visitor Information Toggle Footer Navigation Opening Hours Tickets Annual Passes Vacation Packages Military Discounts Groups & Schools VIP Experiences Corporate Events Directions Frequently Asked Questions Things to Do Toggle Footer Navigation Places to Stay Theme Park Rides & Attractions Water Park Rides & Attractions SEA LIFE Aquarium Seasonal Events Shows & Entertainment Dining Shopping Our Company Toggle Footer Navigation About LEGOLAND California Resort Contact Us Jobs Lost and Found Affiliates Press Room Merlin's Magic Wand Donations Legal Notices Toggle Footer Navigation Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Accessibility Statement Come play your part at LEGOLAND® California Resort, located just 30 minutes north of San Diego and one hour south of Anaheim. With more than 60 rides, shows and attractions, it's an interactive, hands-on theme park experience for families with children 2 - 12. The Resort is also home to SEA LIFE® Aquarium and the world's first LEGOLAND® Water Park. And if you've ever dreamed of spending the night at LEGOLAND, LEGOLAND Hotel and LEGOLAND Castle Hotel at the Resort are open and less than 2 miles from the nearest beach. These LEGO themed hotels feature 500 rooms based on the popular LEGO lines: Pirate, Kingdom, Adventure and LEGO Friends. The LEGOLAND Castle Hotel features Knights & Dragons, Wizard and Princess themed rooms. Add nightly children's entertainment, interactive LEGO features throughout and early access to LEGOLAND Park for Hotel guests and it's the LEGO experience you've always dreamed of! Book your San Diego vacation now. There are eight other LEGOLAND Parks in the world – LEGOLAND Billund in Denmark, LEGOLAND Windsor outside of London, LEGOLAND Florida and LEGOLAND New York in the U.S., LEGOLAND Deutschland in Germany, LEGOLAND Malaysia, LEGOLAND Dubai, LEGOLAND Japan, and LEGOLAND Korea. Prices, times and schedules subject to change without notice. Search Popular Searches Tickets & Passes Rides & Attractions LEGOLAND® Hotel Water Playground ⚠️ Closed for the season. View Tickets & Passes Dive into Fun Splash, slide and cool off at the Water Playground! This oasis features awesome waterslides, a cascading splash with 318 gallons of refreshing water, and more ways to splash and play. Important information: Reservations are required for each member of your party and are available on a first-come, first-served basis The Water Playground closes after Labor Day Weekend. Reserved sessions last 20 minutes each. Reservations open at 7am on day of visit. ​ Children under 12 years of age must be accompanied by an adult 18 years or older. In general, no more than (3) children under the age of 8 should be permitted per (1) supervising guardian . Guests over 40” tall may ride all slides in this area. Guests over 36” and under 40” may only ride the two lower slides. Reserve Now Respectful Play Policy Welcome to LEGOLAND New York! We're excited to have you join us for a fun day of play. To ensure everyone has a great experience, please follow our policy on interacting with our Model Citizens: Zero Tolerance for Verbal Abuse: We do not tolerate any form of verbal abuse or disrespect towards our Model Citizens. Abusive language or behavior will result in immediate action, including possible removal from the park. Play Nice, Play Fair: Treat our Model Citizens with kindness and respect. A smile and a "thank you" can create wonderful memories. Building Positive Connections: If you encounter an issue, our team is here to help. Please communicate politely and provide constructive feedback to keep the atmosphere friendly. Thank you for helping us maintain a safe, positive, and inclusive environment at LEGOLAND New York. Let's build awesome memories together! By streamlining well-known operational workflows and compliance standards, we provide a powerful platform that consolidates DevOps and cloud security, making it accessible and efficient for all. How We Empower DevOps DevOps Automation Empower engineering to focus on what moves the business (not manual tasks). Learn More Cloud Migration Services Migrate your business to the cloud faster, with compliance and security built-in. Learn More Compliance & Security Maintain the highest industry compliance and security standards through automation. Learn More On-Premises Automate your DevOps on-prem with compliance and security out-of-the-box. Learn More Our Leadership Team Venkat Thiruvengadam Founder, CEO & Board Member As an early engineer at Microsoft Azure, Venkat pioneered public cloud technology and played a key role in developing Azure's networking team, writing significant parts of the compute and network controller stack. Recognizing the lack of hyper-scale automation techniques outside of cloud giants like AWS and Microsoft, Venkat founded DuploCloud to bring these techniques to the masses and revolutionize mainstream IT. Zafar Abbas CTO With a background in managing engineering and operations across various industries, Zafar grew his passion for systems infrastructure at Motorola's telecom networks and Microsoft Azure's cloud services. He later applied that passion as an engineering leader at startups like Zenefits and JUUL Labs, managing cross-functional technology teams. As head of engineering and operations at DuploCloud, Zafar sets a high bar for technical excellence and customer experience. Matt Amundson CMO Matt is an accomplished marketing executive with over 20 years of experience building and scaling go-to-market teams, joins DuploCloud to drive global marketing strategies and accelerate customer acquisition. He has a proven track record of growing high-performing marketing organizations and has been a part of four successful business outcomes totaling more than $8B - Foster Grant International (acquired), Marketo (IPO), TIBCO (acquired) and EverString (acquired). He is also an advisor to Salesloft, Sendoso, Canal.com and Scale Venture Partners. Kelly DeHart CRO Kelly is a seasoned revenue leader with over 20 years of experience scaling both sales and customer success organizations, will spearhead DuploCloud’s revenue strategy, including new customer acquisition, value delivery, and customer growth. Kelly’s tenure includes leadership roles at RippleMatch (CRO), Gainsight (acquired) where she was SVP of Sales, and ServiceSource (IPO). Additionally, Kelly is a Member of Chief, an organization dedicated to advancing and sustaining women in executive leadership roles. Tony Barbagallo VP of Marketing Tony brings a wealth of experience building and scaling the corporate and product marketing functions for several startups to DuploCloud. He is passionate about creating value for customers, partners, and stakeholders. He has held a variety of executive positions at growing startups as well as senior management positions at Microsoft, Mentor Graphics, and Sun. Veronica Go VP of Customer Success Veronica's leadership journey in customer-centric roles is distinguished by her resilience and exceptional problem-solving skills. She enhances customer experiences by skillfully blending data-driven insights, innovative technology, and the human touch. Her dedication is deeply rooted in forging authentic connections with customers, positively impacting their journey and success. At DuploCloud, Veronica is pivotal in nurturing partnerships, adeptly navigating customers through complex challenges, and fostering innovation in cloud infrastructure management. Ian Hutchinson VP of Sales Ian Hutchinson, with experience scaling businesses at IBM, Salesforce, and Vidyard, is passionate about scaling product market fit and driving growth through B2B sales and Demand Generation. As Head of Sales at DuploCloud, he works closely with customers to establish cloud and security best practices. He supports cloud and technical partnerships to ensure long-term success and customer satisfaction. Janki Patel VP of Finance Janki has over 20 years of experience leading finance at fast growing technology companies. Her journey includes leadership roles at Quokka, Volterra, AlienVault and Juniper Networks . Her expertise in steering financial strategies and fostering growth has been pivotal in her success across various technology firms. At DuploCloud Janki is responsible for financial management and reporting to ensure that finance and accounting systems and processes scale and grow with the company. Our Board of Directors Navin Chaddha Chairman, Mayfield Navin Chaddha is the Managing Director at Mayfield. He has been named a Young Global Leader by the World Economic Forum and has ranked on the Forbes Midas List of Top 100 Tech Investors thirteen times, including being named in the Top Five in 2020. His investments have created over $60 billion in equity value and over 40,000 jobs. During his venture capital career, Navin has invested in over 60 companies, of which 18 have gone public and 25 have been acquired. As an entrepreneur, Navin has co-founded or led three startups, of which one went public and two were acquired. Navin holds an MS in electrical engineering from Stanford University and a B.Tech degree from IIT Delhi, where he was honored with the distinguished IIT Alumni Award. Patrick Salyer Board Member, Mayfield Patrick brings more than a decade of enterprise leadership experience to Mayfield. He is the former CEO of Mayfield portfolio company Gigya, customer identity and access management leader, which was acquired by SAP. As a first-time CEO who built Gigya into a successful enterprise company, he brings a company building playbook which can serve as a model for entrepreneurs. His operational expertise includes successfully navigating multiple product pivots, establishing a new market category, and scaling to more than $100M ARR and hundreds of employees. He has proven go-to-market expertise, having built global inside and field sales models, and achieved high growth rates. Sumir Chadha Board Member, Westbridge Capital Sumir Chadha, a co-founder and Managing Partner of WestBridge Capital, is based in Silicon Valley. Sumir has invested in India for over two decades across private and public companies. He serves on many boards, including Star Health, Aptus, and Innovaccer. Earlier in his career, Sumir also co-founded and was Managing Director of Sequoia Capital India, working at Goldman Sachs and McKinsey & Co. John Avirett Board Member, Stepstone Group John is a member of the private equity team, focusing on venture capital and growth equity investments. Prior to StepStone, John was a general partner with Greenspring Associates, a venture capital and growth equity investment firm that merged with StepStone in 2021. Before that, he was an associate at Zurich Financial Services. John graduated from Johns Hopkins University with a BA in political science and a minor in economics. Venktesh Shukla Board Member, Monta Vista Capital Venk is the Founder and Managing Director of the seed stage VC fund, Monta Vista Capital. Shukla has been involved with numerous startups as an executive, investor, board member, and adviser. Before starting Monta Vista Capital, Shukla had a long track record of leading companies through rapid growth in his marketing and general management career in Silicon Valley-based companies. Venk holds an MBA from MIT Sloan School of Management and a BSEE from NIT in India. Som Das Advisor Som is an international business executive, investor, and entrepreneur in technology businesses. Som was previously a Founder, CEO, and President of e4e Inc., a Business Solutions Company working between the US and India. Som had been a General Partner at Walden International, a Venture Capital firm pioneer in India, starting in 1996 ($30 M fund). His successful investments include WebEx, MindTree, Sierra Atlantic, Techspan (Headstrong), Infotech Enterprises, Siltera, etc. What we’re up to At DuploCloud Press Release DuploCloud and SaaS Brass Announce the Inaugural Spark100 Honorees, Celebrating Innovation in SaaS Recognizing groundbreaking SaaS startups redefining industries through achievements and impact. Search Popular Searches Opening Hours Vacation Packages Tickets & Passes Go back to blog 4 Must Do’s in the LEGOLAND® Water Park Thursday March 4 th 2021 Caroline Ruthven Water Park When you’re in Florida, it’s always the perfect time to enjoy some fun in the sun – especially at LEGOLAND ® Florida Waterpark ! Here are the 4 must- do’s to have an absolute SPLASHTASTIC t ime at LEGOLAND ® Florida Waterpark! 1. B uild-a- Raft Lazy River Float along our 1,000-foot-long lazy river with a bricktastic twist. That’s right, this is not like any other lazy river. I n our Build-a-River, you can snag floating LEGO® bricks floating along with you and build on your tube! See how many you can catch and how high you can build a tower on your tube! 2. Joker Soake r Hope you’re r eady TO GET SOAKED. Joker Soaker dump 300 gallons of water on you every from a GIANT bucket every 2 minutes. This a wesome water play area has over 5 slides - ye s, you read that right - MORE than 5 slides! And w atch out, there are a lot of hidden water dumps to get your pals when they aren’t looking . It is fun for all dudes and dudettes of all ages to splash around - so this is definitely one you and your little brother or sister can enjoy! 3. DUPLO ® Splash Safari Have you ever played in the water with ELEPHANTS? Ok. I haven’t either BUT at DUPLO ® Splash Safari, you can take a dip with a bunch of DUPLO ® animals. I always love to slide down with the adorable DUPLO ® penguins into the water below ! 4. Twin Chasers You know what they say, t wo water slides are better than one! Twin Chasers is the awesomest slide duo in LEGOLAND ® Waterpark. You know what they say, two water slides are better than one! Pro-tip, TWO riders are better than one, too! On this slide set, you can choose a single or double tube. Word has it that you go faster in a double tube . I always love going double tube with my parents, because nothing is funnier than hearing my dad scream! Well, “WATER” you waiting for? Pack your swimsuit and goggles, because you will not want to miss these must-do's next time you’re at LEGOLAND Water Park . Kids, the information below this is for your parents.  Please do not complete or provide any personal information unless you are at least 13. Search Popular Searches Tickets & Passes Opening Hours Safe to Play Frequently Asked Questions Where is LEGOLAND® Dubai? LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park are just 20 minutes away from The Dubai Marina. We located at Dubai Parks and Resorts located in Jebel Ali South, off of Sheikh Zayed Road between Abu Dhabi and Dubai. What is Dubai Parks & Resorts? Dubai Parks and Resorts is the Middle East’s largest multi-themed leisure and entertainment destination spreading across 25 million square feet of land. In addition to LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park, Dubai Parks and Resorts which also features MOTIONGATE ™ Dubai – a unique theme park showcasing some of Hollywood’s most beloved characters from DreamWorks Animation, Sony Pictures Studios and Lionsgate. The entire destination is connected by Riverland ™ Dubai – a retail, dining and entertainment walkway and guests can stay at the Lapita ™ Hotel, a Polynesian-themed family hotel part of the Marriot Autograph ® Collection. Where can I purchase tickets? You can purchase tickets to LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park online or at the gate upon arrival. Can I buy LEGOLAND® Dubai tickets online? Yes, LEGOLAND ® Dubai tickets are sold on our website. To purchase please click here . Where can I purchase Annual Passes? Annual Passes are available to purchase here , you may also purchase them at our front gate. How can I sign up for LEGOLAND® Dubai newsletter? Sing up at the bottom of this page. Does LEGOLAND® Dubai have a Water Park included? LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park are 2 separate Parks, each requiring their own ticket. For the best value we recommend families either purchase a 2 Park Annual Pass or a 2 Park Combo Ticket. This will allow families to move freely between both parks, but we suggest allowing 1 full day to visit both the Park and Water Park. Can I visit the other Dubai Parks and Resorts attractions with a LEGOLAND® Dubai admission ticket or Annual Pass? LEGOLAND ® Dubai, LEGOLAND ® Water Park and motiongate ™ Dubai all require their own admission ticket or Annual Pass. Do children below 3 years require an admission ticket to visit LEGOLAND® Dubai and the Water Park? Children under the age of 3 can enter LEGOLAND ® Dubai free of charge. please bring proof of age as it will be required to validate the free entry. Can children enter LEGOLAND® Dubai & LEGOLAND® Water Park alone? No, Children below the age of 13 must be accompanied by an adult over the age of 18 whilst on park. Is LEGOLAND® Dubai an indoor or outdoor park? LEGOLAND ® Dubai offers a mix of indoor and outdoor attractions perfect for year round visitation. The theme park includes the world’s first indoor, air-conditioned MINILAND at a LEGOLAND ® Park featuring interactive LEGO models made from over 20 million LEGO bricks. In addition many of our shows, building experience and rides are indoors. LEGOLAND ® Dubai also has plenty of shaded areas to ensure year round enjoyment. Is LEGOLAND® Dubai open all year round? Yes, LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park are open 12 months a year however operational days and park hours will vary. What is LEGOLAND® Dubai’s operating hours? You can view our daily operating hours here How big is LEGOLAND® Dubai? LEGOLAND ® Dubai offers 40 interactive ride, shows and attractions. LEGOLAND ® Water Park features an additional 20 slides and water attractions. Together, its size is approx. 28 ha or 3 million square feet. Which is the perfect age for LEGOLAND® Dubai and LEGOLAND® Water Park? Both Parks are specifically designed for families with kids aged 2 – 12 years old, however we welcome guests of all ages. Do your rides and water slides have height requirements? We have carefully selected our rides and attractions to ensure that there is plenty to do for all children aged 2 – 12 (and for parents too!). However, some of our rides have minimum height requirements to ensure everyone’s safety. These height requirements are provided by ride manufacturers. Does LEGOLAND® Dubai look after my kids while we are in the park? LEGOLAND ® Dubai is the perfect place for a day out with the family. The whole park is family friendly and most rides can be enjoyed by the children and their parents together.  We don’t offer services to look after children. What type of restaurants does LEGOLAND® Dubai offer? Both the Park and Water Park have numerous dining options from kiosks to buffets offering a variety family friendly menu items.  Indoor and outdoor seating is available at the majority of our restaurants.  Annual Pass members receive 10% off all F&B while visiting the Park and Water Park. Will I be able to purchase LEGO® products at the Park? Absolutely, we offer the largest selection of LEGO ® Products in the Middle East. We also have numerous shops located throughout the Park and Water Park offering LEGO ® Products, LEGOLAND ® Dubai souvenirs and all your necessities for the perfect day out. Annual Pass members receive 10% off all retail purchases. Who owns LEGOLAND® Dubai? LEGOLAND ® Dubai is part of Dubai Parks and Resorts, a listed company on the Dubai Financial Market. Merlin Entertainments PLC, Europe’s largest entertainments company, operates LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park. How can I work at LEGOLAND® Dubai? To see our current vacancies please visit http://careers.dubaiparksandresorts.com All available roles are listed here, and applications can only be accepted at the link above. How do I contact LEGOLAND® Dubai? By Email: GuestServices@LEGOLAND.ae By Phone: From UAE: 800 AMAZING (2629464) International: +971 4 820 0000 Social Media: Facebook/Twitter/Instagram/Youtube: @LEGOLANDDubai What are the benefits of being an Annual Pass Member? The best part about becoming an LEGOLAND Dubai and LEGOLAND Water Park Annual Pass holders is you will be able to experience AWESOME for 12 months! For all Annual Pass Benefits click here . How long is my pass valid? Your Annual Pass will be valid for 12 months from activation on regular scheduled operating hours. How do I receive my actual annual passes if I buy them online? If you buy them online , you will receive a "printable ticket" by email on the day that you purchase your Annual Pass online. You can then exchange this ticket for your Annual Pass card the next time you visit LEGOLAND ® Dubai. Please visit Guest Services to have your picture taken and your personalized Annual Pass card issued. If you purcahse your Annual Pass in-park at Guest Services, our awesome team will prepare everything for you on the day. If I purchase an Annual Pass online, how long should I allow to receive it? You should receive your email confirmation with your printable ticket immediately after purchasing it and If not, please email AmazingService@LEGOLAND.ae Does my Annual Pass include free parking? Yes, your LEGOLAND ® Dubai & LEGOLAND ® Water Park Annual Pass includes free park benefits within the Dubai Parks and Resorts Visitor Car Park. The Dubai Park and Resorts AMAZING VIP ANNUAL PASS, also includes free valet parking on each visit. Why do I need to give my email address and phone number to purchase an Annual Pass? We want to make sure you don’t miss any important messages, invitations or special Annual Pass promotions. If you don’t provide your email then we have no way to reach you and you may miss out on extra AWESOME fun and Annual Pass promotions. Does my Membership include blackout dates? Gold and Platinum Annual Passes does not include any blackout dates. Blackout dates do apply on Silver Annual Passes and include the following (all dates inclusive): New Year & Festive Period: 1st – 5th January 2025 Spring break: 24th March - 6th April 2025 Easter break: 18th April – 20th April 2025 (TBC) Eid-ul-Fitr: 31st March – 6th April 2025 Eid-al-Adha: 6th June – 9th June 2025 Islamic New Year: 27th June 2025 Prophet’s Birthday: 5th September 2025 October School Mid-Term Break: 27th October – 31st October (TBC) UAE National Day Weekend: 1st - 3rd December 2025 Festive Period 24th – 31st December 2025 For all benefits please click here . If I change my mind, can I get a refund? Annual Passes are not refundable. Can someone else use my Annual Pass? No, Annual Passes are non-transferrable. We will use a biometric finger print scan at our front gates and your photo will  also be on your card to protect you, if your Annual Pass is ever lost or stolen. Can two people share an Annual Pass? No. LEGOLAND ® Dubai Annual Passes are non-transferable and are issued in the member’s name with their photo. Attempts to use another guest's Annual Pass card will result in the permanent confiscation of the Annual Pass. Can I transfer a pass if I don’t want to use it anymore? No, Annual Passes are not transferable and once the photo ID is issued, the annual pass is only valid for the person named on the Annual Pass. Is there an Annual Pass for LEGOLAND® Water Park alone? No, but LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park Pass gives you admission to both LEGOLAND ® Dubai theme park and LEGOLAND ® Water Park. Can I visit other LEGOLAND Parks with my Annual Pass? Yes, you can buy General Admission tickets to LEGOLAND ® Parks worldwide and enjoy a 50% discount upon presentation of your LEGOLAND ® Dubai Annual Pass. How can I redeem my 50% off general admission to LEGOLAND Parks worldwide as a LEGOLAND Dubai Annual Pass holder? Simply present your valid Annual Pass and avail 50% per entry ticket. Each Annual Pass holder is entitled to one ticket. Please be advised you require a valid printed Annual Pass to present to the park of your choice. Booking confirmations and photocopies will not be accepted. For more information contact guestservices@LEGOLAND.ae How much does an Annual Pass cost? Our Annual Passes are priced at AED495 per person for LEGOLAND ® Dubai and LEGOLAND ® Water Park and AED395 per person for LEGOLAND ® Dubai only. Annual Passes are valid for each guest aged 3 and above. How much does the daily ticket cost? For all ticket pricing please check here Can I host my children’s birthday parties at LEGOLAND® Dubai? Yes you can! For more information and to view our birthday party prices click here. Do you offer packages for school trips? Yes we do! At LEGOLAND ® Dubai playful learning is the core of everything we do. Working with LEGO ® Education we’ve developed fun, hand-on programmes for students aged 5-12 allowing them to build robots, learn how machines work or use LEGO ® Bricks in storytelling! For inquiries please contact schoolgroups@dp-r.com . Are there any special rates or offers for family tickets? At this time prices for both tickets and Annual Passes are based on a per person rate. Can I bring in my own food to LEGOLAND® Dubai? Outside food is not permitted in the theme park or water park except for baby food and small meals for special diet requirements. All guests entering the Parks are subject to bag checks and any food can be confiscated. However, there are several food outlets and dining kiosks in the Parks to satisfy our guests. Please note that if guests are keen to bring their own food due to health or medical reasons, then it needs to accompanied with a Doctors report. Are there any restaurants in LEGOLAND® Dubai? LEGOLAND ® Dubai has 9 dining and food kiosks and an additional 2 in LEGOLAND ® Water Park. Are there any healthy food options at LEGOLAND® Dubai? There are three different restaurants in the park that offer a variety of healthy food options for children and adults. All our children’s meals are served with a choice of water or juice and fruit, you can always swap the fruit for a treat of French fries. Our salads and fruit pots are freshly prepared in all restaurants. We provide allergen information for all the food we serve in our premises. Market Restaurant offers plenty of fresh non-fried dishes. Roasted chicken, oven baked salmon, freshly tossed noodles and a great selection of salads and dips. Caesar Pizza & Pasta is a buffet that offers freshly prepared baked pizzas, pasta and salads. The Café offers a great selection of sandwiches, salads and fruit pots. Are lockers available? Yes, lockers can be rented and are located in FACTORY in LEGOLAND ® Dubai or next to the change rooms in LEGOLAND ® Water Park. Are strollers or wheelchairs available? Yes, they are available for rent at the car park entrance in RIVERLAND, FACTORY in LEGOLAND ® Dubai or upon request in LEGOLAND ® Water Park. What if I need to charge my phone? There are iCharge Powerbank stations in LEGOLAND Dubai located in MINILAND at the exit towards KINGDOMS as well as on The Café Terrace available for rent. Pick one up and return it before you leave at a small cost. Cost is AED 5 per hour, but no more than AED 20 for a full day. Unreturned Powerbanks are charged a one time fee of AED 120. There are also 2 iCharge Powerbank stations in LEGOLAND Water Park at Waves Bistro and another at Brick Bites. Where is Guest Services located? LEGOLAND ® Dubai Guest Services is located in FACTORY, opposite of The BIG Shop. LEGOLAND ® Water Park Guest Services is located behind Admissions, on the left as you enter the Park. Am I allowed to bring in a Professional Camera? Please note that no professional cameras are allowed without prior approval in either of the parks. If you do intend to carry, you will have to leave it with the guest services team during your time at the park. Where is First Aid? LEGOLAND ® Dubai First Aid is located in LEGO CITY, on the right as you exit MINILAND & next to Market Restaurant. LEGOLAND ® Water Park First Aid is located next to the Baby Care Centre, next to Waves Bistro. Do you have a Baby Care Room? Yes & we offer a private area for nursing, changing tables, play area and an area for preparing baby food. LEGOLAND ® Dubai Baby Care Centre it is located in IMAGINATION, next to Fried Chicken Company. In LEGOLAND ® Water Park, Baby Care Centre is located next to First Aid. Are Prayer Rooms available within LEGOLAND® Dubai? Yes, we have male & female prayer rooms located in both Parks. LEGOLAND ® Dubai: FACTORY Street and in IMAGINATION LEGOLAND ® Water Park: next to the change rooms Will I be able to eat and drink in the park during Ramadan? Yes, restaurants in the Park and Water Park will remain open during Ramadan. Do you cater for kids with special needs? Our aim is to ensure that all guests are able to enjoy our Parks. Most attractions are accessible to disabled guests, depending on the nature of the disability. Download our ACCESSIBILITY GUIDE here , where you will find more information that will assist you in planning your visit. If you have further questions, please email us at GuestServices@LEGOLAND.ae I visited the park and I might have lost my property during my visit, what can I do? We hope to reunite all guests with any items they have lost during their visit to the LEGOLAND Dubai or LEGOLAND Water Park. If you have lost an item, simply report it to the team by e-mailing at guestservices@legoland.ae Note: Please be aware LEGOLAND Dubai will not store lost property items for more than one week.  Certain items will not be stored in our lost and found storage due to hygiene related concerns and the items will be disposed at the end of the day. How will childrens height be measured? For Theme Park-the height will be measured with shoes. For Water Park-the height will be measured without shoes. Are there any rides or attractions I can enjoy while pregnant? For your safety and the safety of your unborn child we do have restrictions in place which does not allow pregnant guests to ride on some of our rides.  You may however still enjoy the following rides and attractions: LEGOLAND ® Dubai: MINILAND Submarine Adventure LEGO ® Studios 4D Build and Test LEGO ® MINDSTORMS ® Police HQ Factory Tour LEGOLAND ® Water Park: DUPLO ® Splash Safari - Animal Pool Build A Raft River Build A Boat DUPLO Wave Pool & LEGO Wave Pool Sign up to our Newsletter here! Splash is a social justice organization committed to the poor, an international development agency disciplined around urban economies, a social enterprise dedicated to putting ourselves out of business, and a safe water company focused on children. Put this odd combination together and exciting things are happening. Core Values We shift, we grow, we stumble, we pivot and we continually refine our work and scope—yet amidst the ever-moving landscape of international development, there are core values that act as constants for Splash. People People first. People second. People third. Quality Beautiful products that function and last. Honesty No drama, no surprises, no BS. Joy Kids at heart, seeing potential everywhere. Mistakes Make them, don’t repeat them. Meet the Team The Splash Team is international. We hire fun folks who continually impress us with their smarts, ingenuity and tenacity. We're collegial. We're rigorous. We work hard, play hard, and dream big. Really, really big. Search Popular Searches Opening Hours Vacation Packages Tickets & Passes Go back to blog 4 Must Do’s in the LEGOLAND® Water Park Thursday March 4 th 2021 Caroline Ruthven Water Park When you’re in Florida, it’s always the perfect time to enjoy some fun in the sun – especially at LEGOLAND ® Florida Waterpark ! Here are the 4 must- do’s to have an absolute SPLASHTASTIC t ime at LEGOLAND ® Florida Waterpark! 1. B uild-a- Raft Lazy River Float along our 1,000-foot-long lazy river with a bricktastic twist. That’s right, this is not like any other lazy river. I n our Build-a-River, you can snag floating LEGO® bricks floating along with you and build on your tube! See how many you can catch and how high you can build a tower on your tube! 2. Joker Soake r Hope you’re r eady TO GET SOAKED. Joker Soaker dump 300 gallons of water on you every from a GIANT bucket every 2 minutes. This a wesome water play area has over 5 slides - ye s, you read that right - MORE than 5 slides! And w atch out, there are a lot of hidden water dumps to get your pals when they aren’t looking . It is fun for all dudes and dudettes of all ages to splash around - so this is definitely one you and your little brother or sister can enjoy! 3. DUPLO ® Splash Safari Have you ever played in the water with ELEPHANTS? Ok. I haven’t either BUT at DUPLO ® Splash Safari, you can take a dip with a bunch of DUPLO ® animals. I always love to slide down with the adorable DUPLO ® penguins into the water below ! 4. Twin Chasers You know what they say, t wo water slides are better than one! Twin Chasers is the awesomest slide duo in LEGOLAND ® Waterpark. You know what they say, two water slides are better than one! Pro-tip, TWO riders are better than one, too! On this slide set, you can choose a single or double tube. Word has it that you go faster in a double tube . I always love going double tube with my parents, because nothing is funnier than hearing my dad scream! Well, “WATER” you waiting for? Pack your swimsuit and goggles, because you will not want to miss these must-do's next time you’re at LEGOLAND Water Park . All guests (including children ages 2 years old and above) require the purchase of our VIP experience to accompany the tour group.​ Following a finalized booking, a member of the VIP Experience Team will contact you at the phone number or email address associated with your booking to discuss the details of your experience. Gratuities are discretionary and should be based on the quality of service you receive. Tour hosts may accept gratuities in cash however; LEGOLAND Florida is a cashless Resort.​ Purchase of the Ultimate VIP package guarantees entrance to the park and a separate reservation is not required. Admission ticket included in the VIP Experience is valid for LEGOLAND Florida Theme Park and is not valid for LEGOLAND Water Park. Planning Your Tour Our team of VIP experts can help you preplan details such as start times, special celebrations, dietary needs, and specific family priorities for the day.​ Your VIP Tour schedule will not be a minute-by-minute itinerary which allows impromptu changes to be made along the way if needed. The host will cater the day to your group’s interests and needs.​ Tour length is customizable to your needs. With the Ultimate Tour, your tour can last up to 6 hours. With the UltimatePLUS Tour, your experience lasts up to 8 hours.​ Earliest tour start is 10 AM. VIP groups are to meet their host in the LEGOLAND Florida lobby unless otherwise specified. Important Information VIP Tours are non-refundable. Date changes may be available upon request All offerings, services and experiences are subject to availability. Other restrictions may apply. Tips & Additional Information for Your Day VIP Tours are outdoor walking tours. Make sure to come prepared in comfortable walking shoes and clothing.​ Before you join the fun, remember that all guests are subject to standard bag checks before entry. Leadership – Splash Beverage Group About About Splash Leadership Brands Our Brands Introducing Qplash Brand Support Financials News & Media Contact Menu About About Splash Leadership Brands Our Brands Introducing Qplash Brand Support Financials News & Media Contact Leadership Our management team and directors possess the leadership expertise, skills, and experience to drive the company’s success. Robert Nistico Chairman & CEO of Splash Beverage Group. A 28-year beverage industry veteran, Robert was the fifth employee and VP/General Manager for Red Bull North America, where he led the start-up from zero sales to $1.45 billion. Robert is the founder and CEO of Marley Beverages and was responsible for framing out the long term vision for the company. Earlier in his career, Nistico held executive positions with Diageo and Gallo. A highly motivated, results-driven, creative, and passionate leader with an entrepreneurial spirit and the highest of standards, he has delivered outstanding results in small private start-ups as well as global public environments. His experience has included direct and indirect sales management, strategic brand marketing, production, co-packing, packaging, budgeting, forecasting, profit and loss management, financial modeling, operations and logistics. Robert serves on the Board of Apollo Brands in Dallas, Texas, and holds an Advisory Board position with Transition Capital Partners, LLC (a private equity firm), also in Dallas. More William Devereux Chief Financial Officer of Splash Beverage Group.William Devereux is a strategic finance executive with over 20 years of experience in corporate finance, investment management, and investor relations. He has successfully led multi-million-dollar growth initiatives, secured institutional funding, and optimized financial operations across high-growth consumer and technology sectors. Prior to joining Splash Beverage Group, William was CFO at Hembal Labs and Akin AI, where he secured enterprise contracts, sourced a merger offer, and positioned companies for significant investment. Earlier, he was a Partner at Daruma Capital, where he played a key leadership role in managing a $2B portfolio. He also advised on M&A and regulatory matters at Dames Point Partners and held leadership roles in investment strategy and corporate governance. An expert in corporate finance, capital allocation, and M&A strategy, William holds an MBA from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and a BS in Finance from the University of Florida. More William Meissner President and Chief Marketing Officer of Splash Beverage Group. A proven leader with more than twenty years of success in growing consumer brand companies with both large multinational and medium sized entrepreneurial organizations, Meissner’s expertise includes multiple CEO roles revamping both healthy and distressed companies. Building and restoring brand value has been a hallmark of his leadership history. Prior to joining SBG, Meissner served as President and Chief Executive Officer for Sweet Leaf and Tradewinds Tea, a premium beverage vertical designed to build emerging brands, Chief Executive Officer for Genesis Today, Inc. a leader in the organic nutritional supplements category, Chief Executive Officer of Tazza Pronto, a joint venture between Distant Lands Coffee, Inc. and Caffita Systems SPA, Chief Executive Officer of Jones Soda, President of Talking Rain Beverages, Chief Marketing Officer of Fuze & NOS Beverages (Coca-Cola), Brand Director of SoBe Beverages (Pepsi-Co) and Nutritional Category Manager at Tetra Pak, USA Inc. More Sanjeev Javia VP, Product Development for Splash Beverage Group. He is the founder and President of Javia Wellness Group, a firm that focuses on innovative research, formulation, and design of nutritional exercise and wellness initiatives. As a sports nutrition expert, Sanjeev’s work with Splash Beverage Group is developing innovative functional beverages with health benefits for the consumer. Since 2000, Sanjeev has advised some of the world’s most elite athletes on fitness and nutrition. His client list includes Super Bowl MVPs Tom Brady and Kurt Warner, Cy Young Award Winners Curt Schilling and Randy Johnson, Stanley Cup Champions Marty Turco and Brendan Morrow, Olympic Gold Medalists Brianna Scurry and Caroline LaLive and PGA Golfers Tom Pernice Jr. and Suzanne Pettersen. More Aida Aragon S.V.P. of National Accounts for Splash Beverage Group and is a Sales, Marketing and Brand Management Executive with years of experience in the sports supplement and beverage industry. Ms. Aragon possesses sales marketing experience, having spent a few years in positions in the sports beverage industry. Working with companies like EAS, CytoSport (Muscle Milk) and Labrada. She has played a pivotal role in executing successful store rollouts in specialty stores as well as in food, drug, and mass retailers. Her passion for brand development has always been second nature, but her main focus is to increase sales for some of the leading brands in the sports nutrition industry. Aida has owned her own consulting firm, Verdi Consulting, for the last six years developing brands and assisting in strategy, and new business development. Her latest venture as VP of National Accounts for Splash Beverage Group has afforded her limitless opportunities to increase brand awareness within major national grocery and convenience store chains. Her main purpose is to develop a brand that will make a significant difference in people’s lives and increase their overall well-being. “My mission is to empower people with tools to better their health and to set their body for the best quality of life possible for many years to come.” Aida Aragon embodies a lifetime of passion for the health and fitness industry. The dedication was evident with a successful history of competing in Fitness Competitions and becoming an EAS sponsored athlete in 2002. The partnership with EAS would pave the way for a new career alongside one of the industry’s top brands. She obtained her International Federation of Body Building & Fitness (IFBB) Pro Figure Card in 2005 at the New York Figure Nationals and retired from competitions to continue her career in sports supplements. “These relationships are invaluable as we penetrate this influential channel of distribution.” More 1314 East Las Olas Blvd, Suite 221 Fort Lauderdale FL 33301 (941) 554-8381 info@splashbeveragegroup.com About Brands Investors Press Contact Accessibility Terms Whistleblower Policy​ Privacy Policy​ Menu About Brands Investors Press Contact Accessibility Terms Whistleblower Policy​ Privacy Policy​ © Splash Beverage Group 2022 Facebook Icon (opens In A New Tab) LinkedIn Icon (opens In A New Tab) Menu About About Splash Leadership Brands Our Brands Introducing Qplash Brand Support Financials News & Media Contact 1314 East Las Olas Blvd, Suite 221 Fort Lauderdale FL 33301 (941) 554-8381 info@splashbeveragegroup.com

VIP Guest, 2024 Season VIP Experience Information Reservation Information The VIP experience requires a minimum of 2 guests to book, with a maximum of 12. All guests (including children ages 2 years old and above) require the purchase of our VIP experience to accompany the tour group.​ Following a finalized booking, a member of the VIP Experience Team will contact you at the phone number or email address associated with your booking to discuss the details of your experience. If you do not receive a phone call or email within 48 hours of booking, please contact LLNYRVIPTeam@LEGOLAND.com ​ Gratuities for VIP Hosts are not included in the price of your tour. Gratuities are discretionary and should be based on the quality of service you receive. Tour hosts may accept gratuities in cash however; LEGOLAND New York is a cashless Resort.​ Purchase of the Ultimate VIP package guarantees entrance to the park and a separate reservation is not required. Planning Your Tour Our team of VIP experts can help you preplan details such as start times, special celebrations, dietary needs, and specific family priorities for the day.​ Your VIP Tour schedule will not be a minute-by-minute itinerary which allows impromptu changes to be made along the way if needed. The host will cater the day to your group’s interests and needs.​ Tour length is customizable to your needs. Tour length is up to seven (7) hours. Earliest tour start is 10 AM. VIP groups are to meet their host at Ticket window #15 by the park entrance unless otherwise specified. Important Information VIP Tours are non-refundable. Date changes may be available upon request. All offerings, services and experiences are subject to availability. Other restrictions may apply. Tips & Additional Information for Your Day VIP Tours are outdoor walking tours. Make sure to come prepared in comfortable walking shoes and clothing.​ Before you join the fun, remember that all guests are subject to standard bag checks before entry. Find out which items should stay home here . All Resort guests access the parking lot through the same point of entry. Please inform the parking attendant you are our VIP Guest for the day and after verification of your last name, you will be directed to your VIP Parking spot. The parking voucher you received with your admission tickets can be scanned at the Exit Tolls as you leave at the end of the day. Sign up to our Newsletter here!
